name: Before I Forget (itch)
description:
A funny short visual novel, particularly its first part which consists of prologue and the first day of your summer holidays with your sister Karen who lives in another city, so different from yours.  Explore it with her, cook, discuss films and just have fun!

●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★

Features:

►~15-30 minutes each play-through

►2 Point&Click mini games

►1 another mini game

►different choices

►Original pixel-art and story

►Available for Mac, Windows, Linux. You can also find web version.

●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★●•°••★
